desc: Joyful Wellness yoga studio offers online yoga classes, workshops, coaching and wellness solutions for women of all ages. Get unlimited monthly yoga classes for $45, enjoy a healing Reiki session, or ask about our yoga teacher mentorship program. We offer classes + events to promote your wellness both inside and out!

layout.text: Yoga that makes you feel good in body and mind, LIVE, from the comfort of your living room. No commute, no weather cancellations!
